videos.description: LaMelo Ball throws an underhand pass from the opposite free throw line to Miles Bridges under the basket for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo tosses underhand dime to Bridges in first game back) 2021/5/1 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo tosses underhand dime to Bridges in first game back

videos.description: LaMelo Ball tees up Miles Bridges for the two-handed alley-oop dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo lobs to Bridges for alley-oop slam) 2021/5/1 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo lobs to Bridges for alley-oop slam
